name: The Library (Mangopaw)
description:
A prototype for a dating sim I'm thinking about making for one of my characters.

Might make a full game with decisions that actually impact things, and sprites, and all that fancy stuff. But for now, enjoy this prototype of what might be to come, and tell me what you think.

Have a descriptions of Atticus:

  • Long brown hair
  • Fuchsia Eyes
  • Tall Man
  • Gold circle glasses
  • Suits+
  • Literally just the definition of classy, I don't know what you want from me

And some general knowledge:

  • The Huntre's are a long going family of dimension travelers that fix problems in dimensions. 
  • They're like the TVA of the non-marvel universe
  • But, y'know, less cult-ish.
  • Shades are one of my species, that come from their own dimension
  • And almost any character can be a Huntre since there's a main family line, and everyone outside of the main family line is adopted in
  • Mango is the main character for a number of my stories (Which can be found on wattpad) and is currently the apprentice of Atticus in the game's time 
  • And I think that's enough spoilers for now
